title: Backstage at Giorgio Armani Spring / Summer 2016
content:
Posted in Fashion / Fashion pictures / Milan fashion week / Runway & fashion show pictures 
 

Everyone might talk about the actual catwalk, but it’s backstage where you get to get up close and personal with the hair, makeup and clothes that makes a runway show what it is. 
 
Fashionising.com headed backstage to take in the finer details of Giorgio Armani’s spring / summer 2016 showing at Milan fashion week ( MFW ). 
 
Article continues . To read it in full visit ' Backstage at Giorgio Armani Spring / Summer 2016 ' at Fashionising.com »
